mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, route_path, code, icon, type, level, status, sort, remark, version, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select p.code from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role t1 on t1.user_id = u.id inner join sys_role r on t1.role_id = r.id inner join sys_role_menu rp on r.id = rp.role_id inner join sys_menu p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.status = 1 and r.status = 1 and rp.status = 1 and p.status = 1 and u.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = #{userId};

select p.* from sys_user u inner join sys_role r on u.role_id = r.id inner join sys_role_menu rp on r.id = rp.role_id inner join sys_menu p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.status = 1 and u.is_deleted = 0 and r.status = 1 and rp.status = 1 and p.status = 1 and u.id = #{userId}
